printApheresisProductLabels.successMessage: Print request has been successfully sent.
printApheresisProductLabels.printButtonDescription: Pre-printed labels to be sent to the Collection site.
printApheresisProductLabels.checkboxDescription: Confirm that the expected labels printed correctly and are legible.

idmSampleCollection.toggleDescribtion: IDM test sample has been collected within 7 days prior to Leukapheresis

subjectVerification.checkboxDescription: To verify the Subject identification, please use at least two methods such as Photo ID, Hospital ID and/or Verbal Verification.

collectionBagIdentification.enterAndConfirmDescription: Scan or enter the DIN/Unique Donation Number/Apheresis ID from your site's labels.
collectionBagIdentification.checkbox1Description: Confirm that your site's pre-collection label has been applied to the bag.
collectionBagIdentification.checkbox2Description: Confirm that you have applied the sponsor-provided label to the collection bag.
collectionBagIdentification.scanAndVerifyLabel: Scan or enter the COI number from the label on the cell collection bag.

collectionSummary.productVolume: Total Product Volume (including anticoagulant(s) and plasma)

collectionSummary.autologousPlasmaCollected: Autologous plasma collected and added to MNC(A) product per protocol
